name: existproperty

params_body.name: id
params_body.description: The virtual machine to use, you should keep this zero.

params_body.name: name[]
params_body.description: The property's name, you should keep this "".

params_body.name: value
params_body.description: The property's unique ID. Use the hash-function to calculate it from a string.

return_values: True if the property exists and false otherwise.
related_fn:
Setproperty: Set a property.
 Getproperty: Get the value of a property.
 Deleteproperty: Delete a property.
